positions.subtitle: Mood Indigo IIT Bombay
positions.description: Lead team of 24 with a colleague towards envisioning and materializing the golden jubilee edition of Asia's largest college cultural festival.This involved managing and working along with 10 different work portfolios covering the entire breadth of events, infrastructure and finances through analytical discussions, joint collaborations and combined efforts of the team.Combated COVID-19 obstacles by ideating and executing India's first-ever â€˜digital cultural festivalâ€™; setting new trends in the industry. Designed an interactive VR experience through gamified UI/UX platform with navigation, chat, virtual currency. Recreated live festive feels by 3D model of the IITB campus, 100K+ viewership; 3hrs+ avg. screen time per user.
positions.title: Overall Coordinator
positions.description_html:
Lead team of 24 with a colleague towards envisioning and materializing the golden jubilee edition of Asia's largest college cultural festival.

This involved managing and working along with 10 different work portfolios covering the entire breadth of events, infrastructure and finances through analytical discussions, joint collaborations and combined efforts of the team.

Combated COVID-19 obstacles by ideating and executing India's first-ever â€˜digital cultural festivalâ€™; setting new trends in the industry. Designed an interactive VR experience through gamified UI/UX platform with navigation, chat, virtual currency. Recreated live festive feels by 3D model of the IITB campus, 100K+ viewership; 3hrs+ avg. screen time per user.

positions.subtitle: Mood Indigo IIT Bombay
positions.description: Headed the events department for Mood Indigo 2019.I successfully economized events by 85% (INR 7M to 1M) at the same time increased celebrity-centric events ft. 16 bigshots viz. Deepika Padukone. The fest saw a surge of 20% in footfall during day events. In a team of 3 we introduced Global village- A global festive park with cultural showcase from 20+ countries; 100+ global artists, this initiative also managed to attract 19 different embassies thus reducing the burden of international travel cost of the artists.I am the first events head to successfully complete a sponsorship deal worth INR 0.4M, reducing the load on marketing budget.
positions.title: Culturals and Event Head, Mood Indigo, IIT Bombay
positions.description_html:
Headed the events department for Mood Indigo 2019.

I successfully economized events by 85% (INR 7M to 1M) at the same time increased celebrity-centric events ft. 16 bigshots viz. Deepika Padukone. The fest saw a surge of 20% in footfall during day events.

In a team of 3 we introduced Global village- A global festive park with cultural showcase from 20+ countries; 100+ global artists, this initiative also managed to attract 19 different embassies thus reducing the burden of international travel cost of the artists.

I am the first events head to successfully complete a sponsorship deal worth INR 0.4M, reducing the load on marketing budget.

experience.title: Business Analyst
